task_description: **Financial Advisor (FA):** Hello! I'm your advisor, here to assist you with your financial goals.**Individual (I):** Hi! I'm interested in building a diversified portfolio and looking for Growth Portfolio. I consider myself aggresive in terms of risk, and I have $$100,000 to allocate.**FA:** Sounds good... Any other requirement ?**I:** hmmm, yes, I am looking for something that lowers minimum investment requirements compared to some alternatives.**FA:** We'll closely monitor market trends on your behalf.
